label: Which aperature lets more light in?

choices.value: There is no such thing as infinite depth of field.
A prime lens does not allow depth of field.
Depth of field is a famous farmland in Pennsylvania.

label: What focal length does a human perceive reality, when compared to a full-frame camera?

choices.value: If your lens had legs, it would run really quickly.
